      void transform(Iterator<Document> input, Supplier<BaseURIAwareXMLStreamWriter> output)

    • Method Detail

      • transform

        void transform(Iterator<Document> input,
               Supplier<BaseURIAwareXMLStreamWriter> output)
        throws TransformerException
        Transform a sequence of input documents to a sequence of output documents.
        Parameters:
        input - A sequence of DOM objects. Allowed to throw TransformerException.
        output - A supplier of XMLStreamWriters. Allowed to throw TransformerException.
        Throws:
        TransformerException
